1370: Menzone moved to In den Haeg.A.2 after marriage.
Got married to Walburgis at age 23 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Walburgis, Pietersen, at age 23.
1372: Had a son with Walburgis, Wilmarus, at age 25.
1373: Had a daughter with Walburgis, Imma, at age 26.
1375: Had a son with Walburgis, Alard, at age 28.
1376: Lost son Wilmarus when Wilmarus was 5 years old.
1379: Had a daughter with Walburgis, Badeloghen, at age 32.
1380: Had a daughter with Walburgis, Woltwigis, at age 33.
Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 2 years old.
1389: Had a son with Walburgis, Mense, at age 42.
